about_the_game:
Welcome to a dystopian future where every connection can be your last.

In void future, you take on the role of a skilled hacker operating in a near-future cyberpunk world, where corporations hold more power than governments, and personal freedom is a distant memory. As part of a secret underground hacking collective, you infiltrate corporate systems, steal sensitive data, and uncover dark secrets that could change the course of history.

GAMEPLAY

Engage in intense, tactical hacking missions where every line of code counts. Use your skills to breach firewalls, decrypt encrypted data, and infiltrate heavily-secured corporate networks. But be careful—every action you take leaves a digital footprint, and the more you push, the more you attract attention from powerful forces.

  • Hack & Explore: Navigate through complex systems, bypassing security protocols, cracking passwords, and discovering hidden vulnerabilities.

  • Puzzle-Solving: Each mission offers its own unique challenges, from timed puzzles to logic-based tasks that test your hacking acumen.

  • Upgrade Your Tools: Equip yourself with powerful hacking tools.

STORY

As you complete routine missions for your hacking collective, you stumble upon a set of encrypted files revealing a global conspiracy led by the most powerful corporations. As you dig deeper, you find yourself framed for a crime you didn't commit, forced to go on the run to expose the truth behind the conspiracy. Can you survive the digital battlefield and clear your name?

  • Uncover a Global Conspiracy: Dive into a world of deception and lies, where nothing is as it seems.

  • Fight for Your Life: As the net closes in, you must use all your hacking skills to evade capture, find the real criminals, and bring them down before they erase you from existence.

  • Graphics: DX10
  • DirectX: Version 10
